meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fish.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ichthyofaunal diversity in the river ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed various ichthyofaunal species from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofaunal patterns in the lake were so predictable, even the fish seemed bored.
meanings.sent4: Her movements in the water were as graceful and fluid as an ichthyofaunal dance.
meanings.sent5: The ichthyofaunal colors of the coral reef were a mesmerizing sight for the divers.

meanings.definition: The fish population in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyofaunal of the lake was thriving due to conservation efforts.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were concerned about the decline in ichthyofaunal in the bay.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofaunal of the pond held a secret competition for the biggest fish.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyofaunal of the ocean seemed to move in harmony with the tides.
meanings.sent5: The ichthyofaunal of the river was a vital part of the local ecosystem.
